name: Dataflurry Website Marketing
description:
Dataflurry was founded on extensive experience in the SEO field.
Dataflurry is a small company, and we enjoy it that way. We enjoy providing one-on-one service with our customers, this allows us to have a personal relationship and a large amount of accountability to our loyal customers.
Dataflurry always places the client first. We offer search engine optimization services with no term contract!
Our founder has 20 years of SEO experience.
